Name: Puzzletronics Analog Eletronics
About the game: Puzzletronics is a minimalist puzzle-style game. In this game you will have the experience of moving pieces to form an electronic circuit, while listening to a calm and relaxing soundtrack. This game is not an electronic circuit simulator but it will be a lot of fun to use electronics in this game. Characteristics A totally minimalist environment. A calm and relaxing soundtrack. 70 challenges. Various electronic components. Wide variety of electronic circuits. Have a good time :)
